availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Mary A. J. Wadlington (Princeton, Kentucky, governess.)

body.p: Princeton, Kentucky, governess. Kentucky native. Married to James A. Cartwright. Married to Thomas B. Wadlington in Caldwell County, Kentucky on December 21, 1850. Mother of Thomas Wadlington, Mary Wadlington, and Ann Wadlington. Resident of Caldwell County, Kentucky in 1850. Family governess in Princeton, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Caldwell County Marriages, Film #000851644.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell, District 2, p. 350B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell, Princeton, p. 81.
